\begin{autogenerated}
\begin{longtable}{p{0.22\textwidth}p{0.73\textwidth}}
\toprule
\textbf{Purpose} & Sustain authentic civic participation with traceable inputs, feedback loops, and shared custodianship. \ 
\midrule
\textbf{Obligations} & \begin{itemize}
\item Custodians \shall{register participation events with attendance, consent, and influence statements}.
\item Engagement leads \shall{publish response memos within 30 days} showing how feedback changed obligations.
\item Facilitators \should{refresh accessible glossaries and onboarding materials} for new participants.
\end{itemize} \ 
\midrule
\textbf{Verification Artefact} & Participation ledger with session manifests, consent receipts, and response commitments. \ 
\midrule
\textbf{AEIP Schema} & \texttt{schemas/aeip/tecl-schema.json} \ 
\midrule
\textbf{Evidence Fields} & \begin{itemize}
\item \texttt{session.summary}
\item \texttt{consent.attestations[]}
\item \texttt{influence_statements[]}
\end{itemize} \ 
\bottomrule
\end{longtable}
